mean_en: to make a judgement about the nature or quality of somebody/something; to calculate the amount or value of something
sentence: "How do you assess the risk level of this investment? Low
sentence_trans: 你对这次投资的风险评估是怎样的？低风险、中风险，还是高风险？
word_etyma: ad\u003das有关 + sess坐 -\u003e 文职人员都是坐着的 -\u003e 评估
